# Ryan Rampersad

> Personal website and work history of Ryan Rampersad, a software engineer based in Minnesota.

## Pages

- [Home](https://ryanrampersad.com/): Introduction and links
- [Resume](https://ryanrampersad.com/resume/): Professional resume
- [History](https://ryanrampersad.com/history/): Detailed work history log organized by year
- [Colophon](https://ryanrampersad.com/colophon/): Information about how this site is built

## About

Ryan Rampersad is a software engineer with experience in cloud platforms, security, and full-stack development. The work history section contains detailed monthly logs of professional activities dating back to 2016.

## Contact

- Website: https://ryanrampersad.com
- Blog: https://ryanmr.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/ryanmr
